entry.title: Derivation & Presentation: How to Effectively Tell A Data Science Story
entry.summary:
Description

PyData SF 2016 Gregory Kamradt | Derivation & Presentation: How to Effectively Tell A Data Science Story In A Business Environment |

Data Science is essential for driving business value in the 21st century. This talk will focus on:

  1. Doing data science in the work place through a business lens and
  2. Communicating that data message to your external stakeholders to drive actionable change.

The audience will leave with an alternative understanding of take home tests, interviews, data communication and ultimately ...story-telling.
